snippet: Mirza Teletovic made a 3-pointer with less than a minute remaining to lift the Nets to a 97-95 preseason win over the Sacramento Kings in Shanghai.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets defeat Sacramento Kings, 97-95, in preseason game in Shanghai.
lead_paragraph: Mirza Teletovic made a 3-pointer with less than a minute remaining to lift the Nets to a 97-95 preseason win over the Sacramento Kings in Shanghai.

headline.main: Nets Edge the Kings in Shanghai
